```{r Load, results='hide'}
loadedObjects <- represtools::LoadObjects(params)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
dfEOG <- dfDisag %>% 
  filter(subject == "EOG"
         , subgroup == "ALL"
         , !is.na(pct_glp)) %>% 
  select(school_code, school_year, type, grade, gradeFactor, SchoolYearInt, num_tested, num_glp, pct_glp) %>% 
  left_join(dfSchoolComposition)
```

```{r ListObjects}
represtools::DescribeObjects(represtools::NamesToObjects(lstObjects))
```

```{r Save}
save(file = represtools::OutputFile(params)
```
